name: FishHook
description:
Hello everyone!

I didn't quite have enough time to finish this to the point of my vision. It was intended to be a simple 3D spin-off of Tim's game that he was making on-stream. The whole project was inspired by Jaiden; I didn't think i would have enough time and wasn't going to join the Jam (which i found out about an hour before it started, was a bit last minute.) All in all I don't feel it went terribly. I learned quite a but from the coding challenge, and wound up with a really smooth prototype that has a ton of potential for improvements and expansion. Enjoy and please feel free to leave your feedback.
